channel.title: Web3 Security Paper Digest
channel.description: Curated papers on Web3, blockchain, and smart contract security from ArXiv and ACL

item.title: BugSweeper: Function-Level Detection of Smart Contract Vulnerabilities Using Graph Neural Networks
item.description:
Summary

  • Introduces BugSweeper, an end-to-end ML framework that detects smart contract vulnerabilities from Solidity source code without handcrafted rules.
  • Represents each function as a Function-Level Abstract Syntax Graph (FLAG) combining AST, control-flow, and data-flow information.
  • Uses a two-stage Graph Neural Network: first to denoise syntax graphs, second to perform high-level reasoning for vulnerability detection.
  • Reports strong empirical improvements over state-of-the-art methods on real-world contracts.

Paper Type

  • Research

Additional Information

  • Authors: ['Uisang Lee', 'Changhoon Chung', 'Junmo Lee', 'Soo-Mook Moon']
  • Tags: ['smart-contract-security', 'vulnerability-detection', 'graph-neural-networks', 'static-analysis', 'Solidity']
